title: Centre on Migration, Policy and Society (COMPAS)
abstractText:
The mission of the Centre is to provide a strategic, integrated approach to understanding contemporary and future migration dynamics across sending areas and receiving contexts in the UK and EU.

COMPAS website: www.compas.ox.ac.uk
Contact: Professor Michael Keith, michael.keith@compas.ox.ac.uk
impactText: This grant ended on September 30th 2014 and the final report is due in early 2015 (exact date being discussed with ESRC)
